column4:
['Ab darr hai kiska pyare', '
Gum bhage beta sare', '
Ek rang birangi chidiya', '
Ab to lagegi hath hamare', '
Are mara mara', '
Ab darr hai kiska pyare', '
Gum bhage beta sare', '
Ek rang birangi chidiya', '
Ab to lagegi hath hamare', '
Are mara mara', 'Chugti thi chori chori', '
Jo mere dil ka dana', '
Ud jati thi tadpa kar', '
Nit karke naya bahana', '
Chugti thi chori chori', '
Jo mere dil ka dana', '
Ud jati thi tadpa kar', '
Nit karke naya bahana', '
Hum ishk me jiske barso se', '
Phirte the mare mare', '
Ab to lagegi hath hamare', '
Are mara mara', 'Thi phul se bulbul se bichdi', '
Par ban gayi ab to bigdi', '
Ab garma garam pakegi', '
Din raat pyar ki khichdi', '
Ho jiski khatir maine bhi', '
Dil jan ke sadke mare', '
Ab lagegi hath hamare', '
Are mara mara', 'Din sat ghadi ke honge', '
Satrah ghante ki rate', '
Chup chup kar chand sunega', '
Ek chidi chide ki bato', '
Din sat ghadi ke honge', '
Satrah ghante ki rate', '
Chup chup kar chand sunega', '
Ek chidi chide ki bato', '
Wo jisne khub chalaye hai', '
Dil par nakhro ke aare', '
Ab lagegi hath hamare', '
Are mara mara', '
Ab darr hai kiska pyare', '
Gum bhage beta sare', '
Ek rang birangi chidiya', '
Ab to lagegi hath hamare', '
Are mara mara.']
